Package data

Interface Statistics

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StatisticsSet
    public interface Statistics

    Public view of a set of statistics.

    Statistics are mutable, but cannot be changed outside the package.

    This interface should not be implemented outside the package.

    equals and hashCode delegate to the underlying statistics object.

    See Also:
    TeamRoster

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double completionPercentage()
      Returns the tasks attempted divided by the tasks completed.
      int currentTask()
      Returns the id of current task that user is attempting.
      int numRating()
      Returns the total number of ratings.
      double taskBlasterRating()
      Returns the task blaster software rating based on total performance.
      int tasksAttempted()
      Returns the number of tasks attempted by the user on the team roster.
      int tasksCompleted()
      Returns the number of tasks completed by the user on the team roster.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Return a string representation of the object in the following format: "user [currentTask, tasksAttempted, tasksCompleted, completionPercentage, userRating, taskBlasterRating]".
      User user()
      Returns the user.
      double userRating()
      Returns the total average user rating.

    • Method Detail

      • user

        User user()
        Returns the user.

        Invariant: user() != null.

        Returns:
        User user

      • currentTask

        int currentTask()
        Returns the id of current task that user is attempting. Null if not working on any task.
        Returns:
        int current task

      • tasksAttempted

        int tasksAttempted()
        Returns the number of tasks attempted by the user on the team roster. Invariant: tasksAttempted() greater than or equal to 0.
        Returns:
        int number of tasks attempted

      • tasksCompleted

        int tasksCompleted()
        Returns the number of tasks completed by the user on the team roster. Invariant: tasksCompleted() less than or equals to tasksAttempted().
        Returns:
        int number of tasks completed

      • completionPercentage

        double completionPercentage()
        Returns the tasks attempted divided by the tasks completed. Invariant: completionPercentage() greater than or equal to 0.
        Returns:
        double completion percentage - tasks attempted divided by tasks completed

      • userRating

        double userRating()
        Returns the total average user rating. The sum of all ratings divided by the number of ratings. Invariant: userRating() greater than or equal to 0.
        Returns:
        double user rating - sum of ratings divided by number of ratings

      • numRating

        int numRating()
        Returns the total number of ratings. Invariant: numRating() greater than 0 or less than 5.
        Returns:
        int num rating - number of ratings

      • taskBlasterRating

        double taskBlasterRating()
        Returns the task blaster software rating based on total performance. A combination of completion percentage and user rating. Invariant: taskBlasterRating() greater than or equal to 0.
        Returns:
        double task blaster rating - patented super secret algorithm

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Return a string representation of the object in the following format: "user [currentTask, tasksAttempted, tasksCompleted, completionPercentage, userRating, taskBlasterRating]".
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        string Statistics as a string
